name: Apple, Lime and Chia Smoothie
description: I love the pale green color of this smoothie. Granny Smith and lime make a great marriage and the yogurt and chia seeds make the sweet and tart smoothie substantial enough to get me through the morning.
recipeCategory: breakfast, lunch, quick, shakes and smoothies
keywords: fall, spring, summer, winter, gluten-free, halal, healthy, high fiber, kosher, low cholesterol, nut-free, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 organic Granny Smith or Pippin apple, cored and cut in chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Place all of the ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.
